data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=LbDKrGFcoNgQ7kNvgEevuqw&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDRbZ-tshF3DeR9MJHQm3Ecc5RDnCiJZW0x2EoQOZO1xA&oe=668A7A37)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=m8vQQfSnpRIQ7kNvgHd2akS&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB78s6SI4O0OPNwEsL4qT5VG-wdtYz03dZ5vg657P-D4g&oe=668A87D2)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=gIf8zrjk1Z4Q7kNvgG-2mtM&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAyWh7mujDNn0V67mry_KCFpscP9EHYC258z55o1xLujQ&oe=668A7309)
